biography:
Jennie Eriksen is a seasoned networking strategist and passionate advocate for authentic connection in business. With a strong belief that "Visibility is Your Responsibility," Jennie empowers coaches, entrepreneurs, and professionals to grow their influence and income by mastering the art of networking and messaging that lands and resonates with their audience.
Known for being a "Nifty Networker," Jennie’s passion lies in helping people build genuine relationships that lead to lucrative and lasting business opportunities. Whether speaking on stage, on a podcast, or during a virtual event, Jennie brings high energy, practical strategies, and a touch of inspiration to every interaction.
As a frequent podcast guest and virtual speaker, Jennie loves to engage in rich, value-packed interviews - and is just as comfortable delivering a solo presentation packed with takeaways and actionable tips.
Jennie is available to speak at on podcasts, livestreams, panel discussions, summits, masterminds, and of course at networking events, about topics like networking, visibility, relationship marketing, and audience engagement. All sessions can be tailored to your audience’s needs. Interviews and panels are especially welcomed!
Book Jennie for your next event to learn how to:
Become a Nifty Networker – Build authentic relationships that grow your business
Embrace Visibility as a Business Asset – Learn why being seen is non-negotiable
Leverage Conversations for Collaboration, Not Competition
And much more!
Jennie has an excellent lead magnet available for your attendees, plus optional bonus sessions, strategy chats, and giveaways for engaged audiences.
Presentations
How to Be a Nifty Networker
Networking doesn’t have to be awkward or confusing. In this session, Jennie breaks down the mindset and methods needed to network powerfully, authentically, and consistently—that leads to clients, referrals, and bigger opportunities. Expect insights, stories, and creative ways to connect in today's hybrid business world.
Why Visibility is Your Responsibility
If they can’t find you, they can’t hire you. This inspiring yet practical talk helps entrepreneurs take full ownership of their visibility with actionable strategies that boost confidence, positioning, and outreach. Learn to put yourself out there in a way that feels right - and gets results.

events.name: Ask the Experts - Speaking: To Pay or To Be Paid

name: Jennie Eriksenshe/her/hers

biography:
Dannella Burnett is the owner of Encore Elite Events & Speakers Need To Speak, She’s a creative force with a passion for connecting experts to those they serve through speaking & events while generating profitable and impactful visibility!
Through her connections, millions of dollars have been generated and tens of thousands of lives impacted through speaking and live events!
She believes in multiple streams of income, collaboration, and always finding the win-win-win combination!
Dannella has been in the hospitality and special events industries since the age of 16.  She has owned several businesses in Washington DC and Atlanta GA, won numerous local, national and international awards and frequently featured in industry publications.
Since 2008 Dannella has been a full time entrepreneur and gone from local catering and event planning to serving an international clientele with a true partnership approach.
Clients include National Speakers, Celebrities, Networking Associations, Non-Profits, Corporations and the occasional Bride with a vision.  She is also a speaker on event and speaker strategies, maximizing the stage, event marketing, and networking.  She’s a coach for Speakers, Event Hosts, Vendors and Sponsors.
To connect with Dannella and more Speaker Gigs use:  SPEAKERGigs.com and Dannella360.com

biography: Susan has been an entrepreneur all her life. Since her first lemonade stand, she has completed two marketing degrees, built from scratch several businesses and helped in the launch of hundreds of new ventures. She has been training entrepreneurs since and selling online since 1995, much before google! … and has seen it all. Susan, an expert in SEO & conversions, calls herself an internetologist and now helps entrepreneurs and companies succeed online through her BrandAlign Framework. Susan is passionate about marketing for impact, the power of networking and collaboration to succeed.
credentials: B Comm, MBA, Certified Yoga Teacher

biography:
Kimberly Crowe is the founder of
Entrepreneurs Rocket Fuel
and co-founder of
Speakers Playhouse
.  Her passion is to get entrepreneurs and speakers seen and heard in a bigger way by getting them connected with the stages, the people and the opportunities they need to massively grow their revenue and reach.  From virtual to in-person stages, live stages, podcasts, web summits, webinars, Facebook Live, YouTube shows and TV there are shows and stages with audiences that need your message. "Because if you aren’t being seen, you’re being overlooked!"
Let’s get you connected and out on stages so that you can get your message out and stop being overlooked!
Entrepreneurs Rocket Fuel
, is an active community of entrepreneurs looking to connect, contribute, and grow with other entrepreneurs.
Speakers Playhouse
is a gathering of speakers and stage hosts – having fun and sharing their passions.  Come meet with us weekly and join the fun!
Kimberly is an award-winning international inspirational public speaker, six-time entrepreneur, best-selling author and audio book producer, and a joint venture master connector. Her superpower is turning dreams into reality.
Kimberly is also the mother of two and an adventure seeker, who has hiked sections of the Pacific Crest Trail, navigated Class IV rapids with one of Costa Rica's female Olympic medal-winning whitewater champions, sailed down the coast of Mexico on a 42-foot Yankee Clipper, and traversed 200 miles on horseback through Canada’s Jasper National Park.  Her motto is “live life out loud”
